DOC.detailed_description: This clinical , randomize , control placebo double-blind study . Forty-eight participant perform muscular training protocol . Subjects practice protocol train 60 % load follow 80 % load , measure 1-repetition maximum test , session train protocol . The training protocol consist perform 3 set 7 repetition 60 % 1-RM , 4 set 7 repetition 80 % 1-RM . This protocol perform every session , three time week , employ leg press leg extension machine . Phototherapy , active placebo , apply 6 different point anterior muscle thigh training session . Only one investigator , participate phase assessment trainings session , know program active placebo phototherapy device . Randomisation carry simple draw lot ( A , B , C , D ) first visit .
